message:
Hi Stephen,

Thanks for the response.

I'm not too sure of the inner workings of the UploadAsync method to be honest, I guess I was wondering if this type of pattern "should" work. 

Should the notion of "passing an incoming stream to an outgoing stream" work in the sense that as the code is running and the data is being received it will be "copied" from one stream to another? Is it possible there are some internal properties controlling the amount of bytes to copy across in small batches etc.?

Thanks again for taking the time to respond.
